#summary A very simple wxMax app

{{{
SuperStrict

Framework wx.wxApp
Import wx.wxFrame

Type MyApp Extends wxApp

	Field frame:wxFrame

	Method OnInit:Int()

		frame = wxFrame.CreateFrame(Null, wxID_ANY, "Hello World", 100, 100)
		frame.show()
	
		Return True

	End Method

End Type


New MyApp.run()
}}}
